text: Konrad Pettersson born 1 July 1903 in Älvsbyn, Sweden, dead 18 November 1976 in Piteå, Sweden was a Swedish cross-country skier. He won the Vasaloppet competition in 1927. He represented Luleå SK in club competitions. == References == Category:1976 deaths Category:1903 births Category:Swedish skiers
title: Konrad Pettersson
